sn47.37:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.37:1.4: Tassa kaye kayanupassino viharato yo kayasmim chando so pahiyati.
sn47.37:2.1: Vedanasu vedananupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.37:2.2: Tassa vedanasu vedananupassino viharato yo vedanasu chando so pahiyati.
sn47.37:3.1: Citte cittanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.37:3.2: Tassa citte cittanupassino viharato yo cittamhi chando so pahiyati.
sn47.37:4.1: Dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.37:4.2: Tassa dhammesu dhammanupassino viharato yo dhammesu chando so pahiyati.
